title: Priyanka Chopra on 'hiding' Nick Jonas marriage, The Sky Is Pink and Bollywood return
text:
Priyanka Chopra and Nick Jonas got married last December (Picture: Rex)

Priyanka Chopra and Nick Jonas have been under a huge spotlight ever since they went public with their relationship, at the beginning of last year.

The lovebirds got married in a swanky wedding in December, but have been forced to spend a lot of time apart, with the 37-year-old on film sets, while her beau was in the recording studio with The Jonas Brothers, before kicking off a tour with the band.

But the Sky Is Pink actress revealed herself and the 27-year-old aren’t feeling any pressure by living their romance out in public, and know exactly how to ‘hide’ themselves when they need to.

‘We both have had almost 20-year careers as public people, and I think [the attention] is something we’re used to,’ she told Metro.co.uk exclusively.

‘We find our privacy where we need to find it. We both know how to hide very well, and when we have to, we do.

‘But the fact is it’s the life we’ve chosen, and it’s something we know.’

Priyanka and Nick know how to ‘hide’ well (Picture: Rex)

Which is fair enough.

‘We’re good, very busy both of us, but we’re doing alright,’ she continued. ‘We’re doing good.’

Priyanka has been spending her time shooting – and now promoting – new film, The Sky Is Pink, alongside Farhan Akhtar, Rohit Saraf and Zaira Wasim.

The movie marks her return to Bollywood after three years, and she revealed the project gave her all of the nerves – but in the best way.

Priyanka Chopra made her Bollywood return with The Sky Is Pink (Picture: RSVP Movies)

‘It was after three years that I came back to do a Hindi film, and I’m just really proud that it was this one,’ she said.

‘I wanted to make sure that whatever movie I did was an immersive experience for me.

‘I did Quantico for three years and played the same character, so I wanted to do something which would make me nervous, you know? And this was absolutely that.’

The movie focuses on the true story of motivational speaker Aisha Chaudhary, who was diagnosed with pulmonary fibrosis and sadly died when she was just 18-years-old.

Trust us, you’ll be needing an entire box of tissues for it.

And Priyanka, who plays Aisha’s mum, Aditi, revealed she took on the role because she was ‘inspired’ by the real-life stars – who reminded her of her own parents.

‘This is based on a real-life family, and every single scene has been told to us verbatim by them. There’s nothing that has been made up or added into their story,’ she explained.

‘I found their view on life so inspiring, it reminded me of my own parents. My father always made everything into an adventure. My mother, in spite of anything that came our way, always supported my dreams and ambitions and gave me the confidence to be able have dreams and be able to achieve them.

The Sky Is Pink is released in cinemas on 11 October (Picture: RSVP Movies)

‘With Aditi and Niren [Farhan] they both are like that. Both of them, when they couldn’t even afford it for their daughter’s treatment, went to London and lived there, and did whatever they needed to do to make sure their daughter got the life she did.

‘They were told she was only going to live for five years, and she ended up living for 18.

‘It was incredibly inspiring to me that this real-life couple, who are not superheroes or super athletes, have a super inspiring perspective on life.

’I think they’re incredible people.’

Advertisement

She added: ‘I’m super proud of being a part of that. On set, all of us have become really good friends, we had a great time shooting this movie, there was a lot of love and laughter.’

Count. Us. In.

The Sky Is Pink is released in cinemas on 11 October.
